Title: Will Not End Here
Writer: Vinko Bresan, Mate Matisic, Zivko Zalar
Actors: Ivan Herceg, Nada Sargin, Predrag 'Predjo' Vusovic, Inge Appelt
Plot: The film is set in the present day, but the backdrop to the film is the brutal Balkans War of the 1990's.The main character Martin (Ivan Herceg) is a Croatian War veteran who falls in love with Desa (Nada Sargin), a Serb.
